Dissenter Tips

  • Use the Dissenter icon (the green D on the right of the URL bar) to open up a comments page on any website

  • Turn on the comment badge in the Dissenter Settings to know when there are comments

  • Speak Freely!

  • Download more extensions from the Chrome Extension Store
